data.actual_result: The "(edited)" text is always in English
data.expected_result: The "(edited)" text should be in the language that you currently have selected
data.short_description: The "edited" text that shows up when you edit a message is always in English, regardless of language selected.
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a nonenglish language - Send a message in a server or DM - Edit the message - Notice the words "(edited)" are in English
